title: stencil like font on window display
content:
need help identifying the font used on this window display. appears to be stencil like and it was printed on canvas.  
thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193023im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_5249.JPG)

Font: 

 helvetica regular (expanded 10%) 

Solved By: 

 [George Thomas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193023/http:/typophile.com/user/803 "View user profile.")
author: gncalix

comments.content:
It's nothing more than Helvetica Regular which has been expanded 10%. The stencils were probably added by hand in a sign shop or something although there could be a stencil version somewhere.

Judging from the appearance it was done on a pre-digital typesetting system.
